page.title: 07Pets Animals
page.content: Aspley Guise School ran a survey on pets. 21 families kept none at all. Of the remaining sample there were 35 cat and 33 dog owners;18 families kept fish, 16 rabbits,10 chickens,6 hamsters,6 guinea pigs 1 a goose and 1 a deer. A lot of families kept more than one pet. At home we have two cats, some chickens, cockerels, a goose and a deer. The poultry like to eat corn and the deer eats the grass. I feed the cats every day at tea time and at breakfast. My mum feeds the chickens. Soon I am going to get a rabbit.{ {(Abigail) I have ten fish, some babies and a mother fish. My cat is called Sandy and I have two budgies. {(Jimmy)
